verses.verse: In the mean time, when there were gathered <S%G1996><s%> together <S%G1996><s%> an innumerable <S%G3461><s%> multitude <S%G3461><s%> of people, <S%G3793><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they stepped <S%G2662><s%> one <S%G240><s%> on another, <S%G240><s%> he began <S%G756><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to his disciples <S%G3101><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> of all, Beware <S%G4337><s%> you of the leaven <S%G2219><s%> of the Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is hypocrisy. <S%G5272><s%>
For there is nothing <S%G3762><s%> covered, <S%G4780><s%> that shall not be revealed; <S%G601><s%> neither hid, <S%G2927><s%> that shall not be known. <S%G1097><s%>

Therefore <S%G473><s%> <S%G5607><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> you have spoken <S%G2036><s%> in darkness <S%G4655><s%> shall be heard <S%G191><s%> in the light; <S%G5457><s%> and that which <S%G3739><s%> you have spoken <S%G2980><s%> in the ear <S%G3775><s%> in closets <S%G5009><s%> shall be proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> on the housetops. <S%G1430><s%>

And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you my friends, <S%G5384><s%> Be not afraid <S%G5399><s%> of them that kill <S%G615><s%> the body, <S%G4983><s%> and after <S%G3326><s%> that have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3365><s%> <S%G5100><s%> more <S%G4055><s%> that they can <S%G1410><s%> do. <S%G4160><s%>

But I will forewarn <S%G5263><s%> you whom <S%G5101><s%> you shall fear: <S%G5399><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> him, which after <S%G3326><s%> he has killed <S%G615><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to cast <S%G1685><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> hell; <S%G1067><s%> yes, <S%G3483><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Fear <S%G5399><s%> him.

Are not five <S%G4002><s%> sparrows <S%G4765><s%> sold <S%G4453><s%> for two <S%G1417><s%> farthings, <S%G787><s%> and not one <S%G1520><s%> of them is forgotten <S%G1950><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%>

But even <S%G2532><s%> the very <S%G2532><s%> hairs <S%G2359><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> are all <S%G3956><s%> numbered. <S%G705><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> not therefore: <S%G3767><s%> you are of more <S%G1308><s%> value <S%G1308><s%> than many <S%G4183><s%> sparrows. <S%G4765><s%>

Also <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Whoever <S%G3956><s%> shall confess <S%G3670><s%> me before <S%G1715><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> him shall the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> confess <S%G3670><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>
But he that denies <S%G720><s%> me before <S%G1799><s%> men <S%G444><s%> shall be denied <S%G533><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> shall speak <S%G2046><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> it shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> him: but to him that blasphemes <S%G987><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> it shall not be forgiven. <S%G863><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> they bring <S%G4374><s%> you to the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> and to magistrates, <S%G746><s%> and powers, <S%G1849><s%> take you no <S%G3361><s%> thought <S%G3309><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> thing you shall answer, <S%G626><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall say: <S%G2036><s%>
For the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> shall teach <S%G1321><s%> you in the same <S%G846><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you ought <S%G1163><s%> to say. <S%G2036><s%>

And one <S%G5100><s%> of the company <S%G3793><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> speak <S%G2036><s%> to my brother, <S%G80><s%> that he divide <S%G3307><s%> the inheritance <S%G2817><s%> with me.
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Man, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> made <S%G2525><s%> me a judge <S%G1348><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a divider <S%G3312><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> you?

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Take heed, <S%G3708><s%> and beware <S%G5442><s%> of covetousness: <S%G4124><s%> for a man's <S%G5100><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> consists <S%G2076><s%> not in the abundance <S%G4052><s%> of the things which he possesses. <S%G5224><s%>

And he spoke <S%G2036><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> The ground <S%G5561><s%> of a certain <S%G5100><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G444><s%> brought <S%G2164><s%> forth <S%G2164><s%> plentifully: <S%G2164><s%>

And he thought <S%G1260><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> shall I do, <S%G4160><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> room where <S%G4226><s%> to bestow <S%G4863><s%> my fruits? <S%G2590><s%>

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> will I do: <S%G4160><s%> I will pull <S%G2507><s%> down <S%G2507><s%> my barns, <S%G596><s%> and build <S%G3618><s%> greater; <S%G3187><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> will I bestow <S%G4863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> my fruits <S%G1081><s%> and my goods. <S%G18><s%>

And I will say <S%G2046><s%> to my soul, <S%G5590><s%> Soul, <S%G5590><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> goods <S%G18><s%> laid <S%G2749><s%> up for many <S%G4183><s%> years; <S%G2094><s%> take your ease, <S%G373><s%> eat, <S%G5315><s%> drink, <S%G4095><s%> and be merry. <S%G2165><s%>

But God <S%G2316><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You fool, <S%G878><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> your soul <S%G5590><s%> shall be required <S%G523><s%> of you: then <S%G1161><s%> whose <S%G5101><s%> shall those things be, which <S%G3739><s%> you have provided? <S%G2090><s%>
So <S%G3779><s%> is he that lays up treasure <S%G2343><s%> for himself, <S%G1438><s%> and is not rich <S%G4147><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Take no <S%G3361><s%> thought <S%G3309><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> life, <S%G5590><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall eat; <S%G5315><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> for the body, <S%G4983><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall put <S%G1746><s%> on. <S%G1746><s%>
The life <S%G5590><s%> is more <S%G4119><s%> than meat, <S%G5160><s%> and the body <S%G4983><s%> is more than raiment. <S%G1742><s%>

Consider <S%G2657><s%> the ravens: <S%G2876><s%> for they neither <S%G3756><s%> sow <S%G4687><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> reap; <S%G2325><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G2076><s%> storehouse <S%G5009><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> barn; <S%G596><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> feeds <S%G5142><s%> them: how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> are you better <S%G1308><s%> than the fowls? <S%G4071><s%>
And which <S%G5101><s%> of you with taking thought <S%G3309><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> add <S%G4369><s%> to his stature <S%G2244><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> cubit? <S%G4083><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> you then <S%G3767><s%> be not able <S%G1410><s%> to do that thing which is least, <S%G1646><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> take you thought <S%G3309><s%> for the rest? <S%G3062><s%>

Consider <S%G2657><s%> the lilies <S%G2918><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they grow: <S%G837><s%> they toil <S%G2872><s%> not, they spin <S%G3514><s%> not; and yet I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that Solomon <S%G4672><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> his glory <S%G1391><s%> was not arrayed <S%G4016><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of these. <S%G5130><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> then <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> clothe <S%G294><s%> the grass, <S%G5528><s%> which is to day <S%G4594><s%> in the field, <S%G68><s%> and to morrow <S%G839><s%> is cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the oven; <S%G2823><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> will he clothe you, O you of little <S%G3640><s%> faith? <S%G3640><s%>

And seek <S%G2212><s%> not you what <S%G5101><s%> you shall eat, <S%G5315><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall drink, <S%G4095><s%> neither <S%G3361><s%> be you of doubtful <S%G3349><s%> mind.

For all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things do the nations <S%G1484><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> seek <S%G1934><s%> after: <S%G1934><s%> and your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> that you have need <S%G5535><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> things.
But rather <S%G4133><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> you the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things shall be added <S%G4369><s%> to you.
Fear <S%G5399><s%> not, little <S%G3398><s%> flock; <S%G4168><s%> for it is your <S%G5216><s%> Father's <S%G3962><s%> good pleasure <S%G2106><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> you the kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

Sell <S%G4453><s%> that you have, <S%G5224><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> alms; <S%G1654><s%> provide <S%G4160><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> bags <S%G905><s%> which wax <S%G3822><s%> not old, <S%G3822><s%> a treasure <S%G2344><s%> in the heavens <S%G3772><s%> that fails <S%G413><s%> not, where <S%G3699><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> thief <S%G2812><s%> approaches, <S%G1448><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> moth <S%G4597><s%> corrupts. <S%G1311><s%>
For where <S%G3699><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> is, there <S%G1563><s%> will your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> be also. <S%G2532><s%>
Let your <S%G5216><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%> be girded <S%G4024><s%> about, <S%G4024><s%> and your <S%G3588><s%> lights <S%G3088><s%> burning; <S%G2545><s%>

And you yourselves like <S%G3664><s%> to men <S%G444><s%> that wait <S%G4327><s%> for their lord, <S%G2962><s%> when <S%G4218><s%> he will return <S%G360><s%> from the wedding; <S%G1062><s%> that when he comes <S%G2064><s%> and knocks, <S%G2925><s%> they may open <S%G455><s%> to him immediately. <S%G2112><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are those <S%G1565><s%> servants, <S%G1401><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> when he comes <S%G2064><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> watching: <S%G1127><s%> truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that he shall gird <S%G4024><s%> himself, and make <S%G347><s%> them to sit <S%G347><s%> down <S%G347><s%> to meat, and will come <S%G3928><s%> forth <S%G3928><s%> and serve <S%G1247><s%> them.

And if <S%G1437><s%> he shall come <S%G2064><s%> in the second <S%G1208><s%> watch, <S%G5438><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> in the third <S%G5154><s%> watch, <S%G5438><s%> and find <S%G2147><s%> them so, <S%G3779><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> are those <S%G1565><s%> servants. <S%G1401><s%>

And this <S%G5124><s%> know, <S%G1097><s%> that if <S%G1487><s%> the manager <S%G3611><s%> of the house <S%G3617><s%> had known <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> the thief <S%G2812><s%> would come, <S%G2064><s%> he would have watched, <S%G1127><s%> and not have suffered <S%G863><s%> his house <S%G3624><s%> to be broken <S%G1358><s%> through. <S%G1358><s%>
Be you therefore <S%G3767><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> for the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> at an hour <S%G5610><s%> when you think <S%G1380><s%> not.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> you this <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> to us, or <S%G2228><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to all? <S%G3956><s%>

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G686><s%> is that faithful <S%G4103><s%> and wise <S%G5429><s%> steward, <S%G3623><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his lord <S%G2962><s%> shall make <S%G2525><s%> ruler <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> his household, <S%G2322><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> them their portion <S%G4620><s%> of meat <S%G4620><s%> in due season? <S%G2540><s%>
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is that servant, <S%G1401><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his lord <S%G2962><s%> when he comes <S%G2064><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> doing. <S%G4160><s%>
Of a truth <S%G230><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that he will make <S%G2525><s%> him ruler <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that he has. <S%G5224><s%>

But and if <S%G1437><s%> that servant <S%G1401><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> in his heart, <S%G2588><s%> My lord <S%G2962><s%> delays <S%G5549><s%> his coming; <S%G2064><s%> and shall begin <S%G756><s%> to beat <S%G5180><s%> the menservants <S%G3816><s%> and maidens, <S%G3814><s%> and to eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink, <S%G4095><s%> and to be drunken; <S%G3182><s%>

The lord <S%G2962><s%> of that servant <S%G1401><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> in a day <S%G2250><s%> when he looks <S%G4328><s%> not for him, and at <S%G1722><s%> an hour <S%G5610><s%> when he is not aware, <S%G1097><s%> and will cut <S%G1371><s%> him in sunder, and will appoint <S%G5087><s%> him his portion <S%G3313><s%> with the unbelievers. <S%G571><s%>

And that servant, <S%G1401><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> his lord's <S%G2962><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> and prepared <S%G2090><s%> not himself, neither <S%G3366><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> according <S%G4314><s%> to his will, <S%G2307><s%> shall be beaten <S%G1194><s%> with many <S%G4183><s%> stripes.

But he that knew <S%G1097><s%> not, and did commit <S%G4160><s%> things worthy <S%G514><s%> of stripes, <S%G4127><s%> shall be beaten <S%G1194><s%> with few <S%G3641><s%> stripes. <S%G4127><s%> For to whomsoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> is given, <S%G1325><s%> of him shall be much <S%G4183><s%> required: <S%G2212><s%> and to whom <S%G3739><s%> men have committed <S%G3908><s%> much, <S%G4183><s%> of him they will ask <S%G154><s%> the more. <S%G4055><s%>

I am come <S%G2064><s%> to send <S%G906><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the earth; <S%G1093><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> I, if <S%G1487><s%> it be already <S%G2235><s%> kindled? <S%G381><s%>
But I have <S%G2192><s%> a baptism <S%G908><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> with; and how <S%G4459><s%> am I straitened <S%G4912><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> it be accomplished! <S%G5055><s%>

Suppose <S%G1380><s%> you that I am come <S%G3854><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> earth? <S%G1093><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, No; <S%G3780><s%> but rather <S%G2228><s%> division: <S%G1267><s%>

For from now on <S%G3568><s%> there shall be five <S%G4002><s%> in one <S%G1520><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> divided, <S%G1266><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> three. <S%G5140><s%>

The father <S%G3962><s%> shall be divided <S%G1266><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> the son, <S%G5207><s%> and the son <S%G5207><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> the father; <S%G3962><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> the daughter, <S%G2364><s%> and the daughter <S%G2364><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> the mother; <S%G3384><s%> the mother <S%G3994><s%> in law <S%G3994><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> her daughter <S%G3565><s%> in law, <S%G3565><s%> and the daughter <S%G3565><s%> in law <S%G3565><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> her mother <S%G3994><s%> in law. <S%G3994><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the people, <S%G3793><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G1492><s%> a cloud <S%G3507><s%> rise <S%G393><s%> out of the west, <S%G1424><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> There comes <S%G2064><s%> a shower; <S%G3655><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> it is.
And when <S%G3753><s%> you see the south <S%G3558><s%> wind blow, <S%G4154><s%> you say, <S%G3004><s%> There will be heat; <S%G2742><s%> and it comes <S%G1096><s%> to pass.

You hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> you can <S%G1492><s%> discern <S%G1381><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> and of the earth; <S%G1093><s%> but how <S%G4459><s%> is it that you do not discern this <S%G5126><s%> time? <S%G2540><s%>
Yes, and why <S%G5101><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> of yourselves <S%G1438><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> you not what <S%G3588><s%> is right? <S%G1342><s%>
